foundingQuote: I am greately dissapointed with the state of the non-profit cybersecurity sector in Croatia. We have no associations, no privacy advocacies, and no CVE numbering authorities. High quality resources are far in between. That's why we founded Carbophile Group, to change that.
mission: At Carbophile Group, our mission is to keep it that way. We are a Croatian collective of cybersecurity experts, developers, and privacy advocates dedicated to building a safer digital world.
